successes.title: B9Creator - A DIY High Resolution 3D Printer
successes.description: A 3D Printer that delivers the fine detail you crave!

Pledges.description: A huge THANK YOU! for supporting our efforts to advance 3D Printing.

NOTE  For current B9Creator v1.0 owners ONLY!   UPGRADE OPTION #3. Includes: Everything in Option #1 plus Option #2 plus "New Parts". Includes USPS Priority Mail Shipping.
